âš¡ Real-time multiplayer action

ğŸš€ Why Play House of Hazards?
Jump into this thrilling party game that turns everyday household items into exciting obstacles! Challenge your friends and see who can survive the longest in this chaotic house of fun! ğŸ âœ¨
